name: ssr-benchmarks
description: Repo to test performance of various SSR approaches

scripts.benchwalk: NODE_ENV=production benchwalk --suite-name 'ssr rendering' methods/react-ssr/dist/index.js methods/svelte-ssr/dist/index.js methods/vanilla-function/dist/index.js methods/vhtml/dist/index.js methods/vhtml-htm/dist/index.js

author: Jacky Efendi
